text: Hellha wo Ehtallha is a game and entertainment program titled “ Fort Boyard ” presented by Tony Baroud and Karen Der Kaloustian. It is the Arabic version of a similar French program الاثنيـن 01 رجـب 1423 هـ 9 سبتمبر 2002 العدد 8686 «حلها واحتلها» جديد طوني بارود على شاشة الـ «ال. بي. سي» بيروت: «الشرق الإوسط» == About the program == Prepared by Michel Sinan and Lara Fadel, directed and managed by a Frenchman. The participants are well-known figures in the media, sports and artistic circles. A castle in the middle of the sea. The team goes through several stages within one episode, which enables it to reach the finals and the treasure. The Lebanese actor Gabriel Yammine played the role of “Al-Alem Firas” who helps the team solve the puzzles prepared for them Al Jarasضاع الابداع العربي ويتباهون ببرامج مستنسخة! مجلة الجرس الثلاثاء 30 أيلول 2014 قلعة “حلّها واحتلّها” تفقد “دعبول” القوات اللبنانية == References == Category:2002 Category:Television game shows
title: Hellha wo Ehtallha
